column4: I am on a machine with integrated graphics, it only runs at around 600x800. what should I do
run 'gksudo displayconfig-gtk' and see if you can select a more appropriate display than what's autodetected.
sorry! Didn't see your comment. Ok will give that a shot
Do I need to restart X after that
ran that command you told me, and selected a different model option
did you pick a generic one?
did you close the dialog after that, or did you hit Ctrl-Alt-Backspace after that?
I think I may have picked LCD though, this is a CRT. Guess I'll give it another go. Yes, I closed the dialog and restarted X
It has changed it back to "Plug n' Play"
that shouldn't be. Did you call it with gksudo?
is 800x600 the best available through System-Preferences-Screen Resolution?
